author: Staff Reporter
text:
In the midst of the multiple arrests of alleged terror suspects in the city on Saturday, a constable of the Telengana ATS was stabbed by a suspect who resisted arrest. The incident led to tense moments at Doddanagamangala, a crowded neighbourhood near Electronics City, where sleuths from the National Investigation Agency (NIA) and Telangana ATS tried to detain a terror suspect.

After attacking the constable, the suspect allegedly swallowed a pebble in an attempt to kill himself.

Both the constable and the suspect are undergoing treatment at two different city hospitals.

Police sources said the two are said to be out of danger.

However, security personnel have not lodged a complaint with the local Parappana Agrahara police.
title: Suspect stabs constable, swallows pebble
